The significance of this discovery was not lost on
Darkangel.

"I guess this raises the question of just who we can
and cannot trust.  A major wildcard is a Maximal
warrior by the name of Shadowcaster who according to
all records died defending the Ark during Megatron's
attack using the Nemesis. He claims to be sent back
from the Matrix by Primus, whic if true means he could
well be a good option to turn to should the weapon
fail. On the other hand, if this is really a hoax by
Unicron then I fear we are all in danger. Assuming he
is the spawn of Unicron, even if we were able to foil
his ruse, he is as powerful as Optimal Optimus,
however, much faster, and with cloaking capabilities.
Whatever the case, it would seem that our problems are
increasing." 

 --- Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote: 
---------------------------------
Tyrael was grave yet again.

Tyrael: A file appeared. It was labelled as a .UCR
file. Logically, 
if Maximal files are labelled .MAX, Preds as .PRD and
Tripredacus 
as .TRP, then I figure that .UCR means he is a Minion.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Polar Claw
<cycodrone@y...> wrote:
> Darkangel wasted no time in activating the failsafes
> of the CR Tanks and geting him out of there as fast
as
> he possibly could. Something was not right- Tyrael
was
> not prone to rash action- whatever he just found, it
> must have been something worthy of some serious
worry.
>  Brisky walking over to Tyrael, he decided that
> whatever it was, they were all best prepared if they
> knew exactly what they were dealing with.
> 
> "What is it? What did you discover?" 
> 
>  --- Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote: 
> ---------------------------------
> In his sorrows, Bloodblade noticed a flash on him
and
> suddenly 
> focused on it. Void? Pain? What was going on?
> 
> Tyrael was curious at what was heppening, when
> suddenly, a file 
> appeared on the screen. The designation made him
> doubt, then sent a 
> chill in his body.
> 
> Tyrael: By the Matrix! Darkangel! Drag him out of
the
> base now!
> 
> 
>
